issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: FTPFileSystem#listStatus get currentPath and parentPath at the same time, causing recursively list action endless

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

fields.summary: FTPFileSystem instance in TestFTPFileSystem should be created before tests and closed after tests

[~stevel@apache.org], [~brahmareddy] [~yzhangal]  Can you give me a code review ? Seen the details of findbugs, i found one related to my change code class, but it does not match the code i submit, no matter in patch 002 or patch 003.
[~Hongyuan Li] thanks for updating the patch..+1,on latest patch.. will hold the commit till [~steve_l]/[~yzhangal] looks into this.

HI Guys, thanks for catching the issue, patching and reviewing!

What about doing:

action = action.or(FsAction.READ);

instead of

permission |= FsAction.READ.ordinal(); and convert the result later.

FYI [~steve_l] in case you'd like to comment.

Thanks.

[~yzhangal] patch-002 does as what you comment.
[~stevel@apache.org] Would you mind giving me a code review?
[~yzhangal] resubmit the patch as you have said.
